caption.title: Satellite image of the damage to Southern California from the Woolsey Fire as of November 11, 2018.
caption.p: "Areas likely damaged by the Woolsey Fire as of Sunday, Nov. 11. It covers an area of about 50 miles by 25 miles (80 km by 40 km) â€” framed by the red polygon. The color variation from yellow to red indicates increasing ground surface change, or damage."
